--guidingYouToRightChannels--: Get guided help for your business need
--enrichYourDescription--: Enrich your description with details such as estimated spend and suppliers (if any).
--describeYourBusinessNeedAi--: Let's get started! Please describe your business needs, including budget, specifications and timeline. (The more details provided, the better the recommendations will be)
--uploadDocumentAi--: Already have a proposal? Upload to extract all details, and let AI do the heavy lifting

--comingSoon--.--primaryMessage--: We are currently working on this request to give you the best experience.

--tips--.--hereAreExamples--: Here are a few examples to get you started
